entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
